lporfForm.title: Confidential Address Form
lporfForm.subtitle: LPOR-F - To be used when petitioner does not want defendant to learn address

filingPurpose.description: Petitioner files this petition on behalf of:

addresses.description: Please provide address information for all parties. Check the box below if all parties live at the same address.
addresses.differentAddressWarning: If children or incompetent persons have different addresses, a separate form must be completed for each address.

sameAddressForAll.label: All parties live at the same address

minorChildren.description: Add details for each minor child (Name, Date of Birth, Relationship to Petitioner):
minorChildren.listDescription: Add details for each minor child below:
minorChildren.maxEntriesMessage: Maximum 6 children per form. Please complete a separate form for additional children.
minorChildren.validationError: At least one minor child must be added when filing on behalf of minor children.

allegedIncompetent.description: Add details for each alleged incompetent person (Name, Date of Birth, Relationship to Petitioner):
allegedIncompetent.listDescription: Add details for each alleged incompetent person below:
allegedIncompetent.emptyStateText: No alleged incompetent persons added yet
allegedIncompetent.maxEntriesMessage: Maximum 2 incompetent persons per form. Please complete a separate form for additional persons.
allegedIncompetent.validationError: At least one alleged incompetent person must be added when filing on behalf of alleged incompetent persons.

fullName.label: Full Name
fullName.helpText: Enter the full legal name of the defendant

parentGuardianName.label: Parent/Guardian Name (if defendant is a minor)
parentGuardianName.helpText: Enter parent or guardian name if defendant is a minor

incidentLocation.label: Location of Incident
incidentLocation.placeholder: Enter the location where the violation occurred

violationType.label: Type of Violation (select all that apply)

violationDescription.label: Description of Violation
violationDescription.placeholder: Provide a detailed description of how the protection order was violated

policeNotified.label: Were the police notified of this violation?

isEmergency.label: Is this an emergency request requiring immediate attention?

emergencyReason.label: Reason for Emergency
emergencyReason.placeholder: Explain why this requires immediate attention

confirmation.label: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete
confirmation.helpText: Please review all information before submitting. This confirmation is required to proceed.

success.title: Form Submitted Successfully!
success.description: Your {{formType}} form has been generated and downloaded to your device.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps:
nextSteps.step1: Review the downloaded PDF for accuracy
nextSteps.step2: Print and sign the document where required
nextSteps.step3: File the form with the appropriate court
nextSteps.step4: Keep a copy for your records

success.importantNote: This form must be filed with the court to be legally effective. Consult with legal counsel if you have questions about the filing process.
